contentrichtext.text: '''Devil's Hole State Park''' is located in [[Niagara County, New York]] north of the City of [[Niagara Falls, New York|Niagara Falls]]. The park overlooks the [[Niagara River]] Gorge. The park offers fishing, hiking, nature trail, picnic tables, snow-shoe trails, and cross-country skiing. ==See also== * [[List of New York state parks]] ==External links== * [http://nysparks.state.ny.us/parks/42/details.aspx Devil's Hole State Park], [http://nysparks.state.ny.us/ New York State Office of Parks, Recreation & Historic Preservation] {{coord|43.135|-79.046|type:city_region:US|format=dms|display=title}} <!--Navigation boxes--><br clear=all /> {{Protected Areas of New York}} [[Category:State parks of New York]] [[Category:Parks in Niagara County, New York]] {{NiagaraCountyNY-geo-stub}}
